name: Royal Cat Puzzle
description:
King Gustav the charming kitty is in trouble – boredom has taken over the world! Help the king beat challenging levels. Build vertical and horizontal lines and destroy obstacles using royal blocks. Beat the Monsters of Boredom and free all the scared animals. Royal Puzzle is a fun and addictive game unlike any other puzzle game!

Try the new and incredible Royal Puzzle. No more boredom – it's time to relax. Help Gustav the kitty restore happiness and joy to the charming animals.

Begin your journey in a terrifying world controlled by the Monsters of Boredom. Fight bosses, solve puzzles, and help the animals. King Gustav is waiting for you. Join this charming kitty and his friends to discover more animals and collect cards. Explore various lands with interesting environments.

Royal Puzzle was developed by the creators of Dreamland Story. Match, have fun, and solve challenging puzzles. We'll provide you with unlimited entertainment.

Royals Puzzle features:
● Hundreds of fun and unique LEVELS released EVERY WEEK!
● PLAY anywhere, even OFFLINE!
● COLLECT new CARDS with charming animals!
● WIN gold coins and boosters!
● FIGHT abysmal Bored Monsters and Bored Bosses!
● GET free gifts every day!
● DISCOVER new lands and episodes!
● SOLVE easy and hard puzzles!
● EASY to learn and very addictive!
● PLAY with friends and get free gifts every day!
● UNIQUE Royal Puzzle!

Have fun and complete subsequent levels. We'll provide you with unlimited entertainment!
publishers: REMI VISION SP Z O O SPOLKA KOMANDYTOWA
